message.body: Hey Matt! I know you are super busy but I would really love to see you before I move to boston. Will you be around at the end of next week? I can meet you anywhere, and bring you a coffee. Think about it. Send my love to Allison and yassir!

Hey lady! Yes. Sounds good I would like to catch up. I've been teaching that summer class and swamped. Sorry I missed your show. Looks like it was great. I teach til 4:15 or so every day next week. Do you want to stop in at penn and catch up a little bit? Mon, tues, or weds?
Maybe weds might not be able to make it that early, is thurs good?
I'm coming from ny either wed night or Thursday. Btw I have a white iPhone.

Yeah. I think so. We are hanging the highschool show that evening so I may have to be at penn for a couple of hours extra. Let me know when you make it in town and we figure out a plan. iPhone rocks betch
